text: I think they need to have Heroes that
Inspire them I think they need to see
the adults in the generation above them
well two things they need to see the
adults in the generation above them as
people who are living lives of Integrity
people who are living passionately
people who are living beyond themselves
who are not satisfied with tried answers
people who are willing to go there to
enter into any discussion no topic is
off limits and they see people who will
actually put their faith into practice
um it seems like maybe students or
younger generation see the their their
parents generation as those who did a
lot of talking but not a lot of action
so I think they need to see that um
happening to inspire them but I also
think that they need to believe that
they have something significant to
contribute there's been a lot of talk in
the last I don't know 15 to 20 years
about the generations I'm I'm a gen um
baby boomer so the generations coming
behind me it's been a lot of criticism
of of them as being people very
self-absorbed thinking about the career
thinking about where they're going to go
in life materialistic and um I think if
they can see themselves as somebody who
can make a significant contribution that
really all of these things that we're
dealing with on a world basis all the
things that you're even bringing up that
if they don't see themselves as as not
only part of the solution but the
solution um I think when they get
mobilized to that then then they'll get
active uh last week on world AIDS day we
did not only a global Summit on AIDS um
for just anybody who wanted to come but
on world AIDS day we did a youth Summit
and we had about a thousand students
Junior High to college students gathered
at our church plus 200 churches who
simoc cast it so there were several more
thousand um who were watching by simoc
cast there were like 4,000 students on
world AIDS day who were gathered in one
place saying you know what we're going
to take on HIV we're not content to let
this be something that only our parents
generation dealt with we're not content
to to just let this be something that
takes over and continues to decimate
lives we're taking a stand we're
committing to remain HIV free ourselves
we're committed to helping other
students remain hi free and we're going
to care for people who are HIV positive
the excitement in that place was
palpable you could touch it you could
cut it with a knife they went out of
there so jazzed and so enthusiastic
believing that they had a contribution
to make to a significant world problem
